name: Military Aircraft - Coloring Game
description: Here is a continuation of coloring books from Popoff Developer Studio. We have included the most famous military and transport aircraft in the world. Paint a picture and you will be able to see the aircraft in action. New game contains 11 detailed aircraft submitted in the real world. We even picked up for each aircraft, its unique sound of the screws and the hum of turbines, to as close as possible to reality. Every aircraft has discriptions on ten languages. This game will not leave anyone indifferent.
